content: The stretch run of this campaign seems destined to culminate in a stupefying torrent of absurdities from the pro-Hillary partisans (e.g. This piece and its ‘The People’s Republic of China, Champion of Global Environmentalism’ premise). Yes, the PRC, a nation where hundreds of millions of people don face masks when they leave their homes to protect themselves from the noxious fumes that pass for ‘air’.
